Guidelines for preventive disinfection
Guidelines for preventive disinfection
Guidelines for preventive disinfection
Guidelines for preventive disinfection
Guidelines for preventive disinfection
Enterprises can adopt the way of centralized work and centralized rest to maintain normal production and operation
Implementation of closed management in pension institutions in the whole city
Beijing citizens in Hubei are not allowed to leave Hubei without authorization in violation of regulations.
Dissuade those who do not wear masks
All colleges and universities, primary and secondary schools and kindergartens will postpone the opening of school, and the specific time will be notified by the education department.
Extend the Spring Festival holiday in 2020 to February 2 and work normally from February 3.
People should wear masks when entering and leaving the community, and the community (Village) should be supervised and reminded.
Urge individuals not to shake hands and wash hands frequently
Supervise and urge families to open windows for ventilation and strengthen daily cleaning and disinfection when air quality permits
The community (Village) does not organize large-scale public gathering activities
When necessary, it can stop the market, assembly and other crowd gathering activities in the community (Village), and close public places such as cinemas and Internet cafes.
Reduce family gatherings
Closing the cinema
Qualified enterprises shall arrange employees to finish their work at home through telephone, Internet and other means
During the period of the epidemic, public and operational human resource service agencies at all levels in the city suspended the organization of local on-site recruitment activities
The guard at the entrance and exit of the community should wear masks when working
The catering service operators in the whole city should strictly perform the standard operation according to the requirements of the food safety operation specification for catering service
Within 14 days before arriving in Beijing, those who leave the high incidence areas or have contact history with people in the high incidence areas shall not go out
People should reduce going out activities and not participate in parties and group activities
All public places, such as recreational rooms and recreational rooms, which are not necessary for life in the community (Village), shall be closed.
All municipal enterprises should strictly organize disinfection and safety inspection after returning to work.
If conditions permit, the municipal enterprises should implement the flexible working system and adopt the methods of remote office, wrong time, wrong peak and shift to work.
If conditions permit, the municipal enterprises should implement the flexible working system and adopt the methods of remote office, wrong time, wrong peak and shift to work.
All municipal enterprises should strictly implement closed management of public places after returning to work
Ensure the health of employees in restaurants and canteens. Keep dining environment clean and airy.
Restaurant attendance should be controlled below 50%
Medical surgical masks, medical protective masks, goggles, isolation clothing and other protective articles shall be replaced in a timely manner.
When using protective equipment correctly, wash hands before wearing gloves, and wash hands with flowing water immediately after removing gloves or isolation clothing.
Strictly implement the requirements of "medical staff hand hygiene standard"
Personnel should wear disposable medical masks during the whole process of on-site investigation
During on-site investigation, personnel should carry hand sanitizer and disposable gloves if possible
If the mask is suspected to be contaminated, the removed mask should be sprinkled with 1000mg / L chlorine containing disinfectant solution until it is completely wet
